comment: Conservatives let you keep your hard earned money so you can be more productive and more independent. Liberals want to take your hard earned money from you so they can bribe you with it and be under their control. Vote in November.

            :ARG1 (k / keep-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (m2 / money
                        :ARG1-of (e / earn-01

                        :poss y)
                  :purpose (p2 / possible-01
                        :ARG1 (a / and

                                    :ARG0 y
                                    :ARG2-of (h2 / have-degree-91
                                          :ARG1 y
                                          :ARG3 (m3 / more)))
                              :op2 (d / depend-01
                                    :polarity -
                                    :ARG0 y
                                    :ARG2-of (h3 / have-degree-91
                                          :ARG1 y
                                          :ARG3 (m4 / more))))))
            :snt2 (w / want-01
                  :ARG0 (p4 / person

                  :ARG1 (t / take-01
                        :ARG0 p4
                        :ARG1 (m5 / money
                              :ARG1-of (e2 / earn-01
                                    :ARG1-of (h4 / hard-02))
                              :poss y)
                        :ARG2 (y2 / you)
                        :purpose (p5 / possible-01
                              :ARG1 (a2 / and

                                          :ARG0 p4
                                          :ARG1 y2
                                          :ARG2 m5)
                                    :op2 (c2 / control-01
                                          :ARG0 p4
                                          :ARG1 y2)))))
            :snt3 (v / vote-01
                  :time (d2 / date-entity
                        :month 11))))

comment: What someone does sexually in their own time is their business. And using such a derogative term shows how little we've moved forward.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (b / business
            :poss (s / someone)
            :domain (t / thing
                  :ARG1-of (d / do-02
                        :ARG0 s
                        :manner (s2 / sexual)
                        :time (t2 / time
                              :poss s))))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op2 (s3 / show-01
                  :ARG0 (u / use-01
                        :ARG1 (t3 / term
                              :ARG1-of (d2 / derogate-01)
                              :mod (s4 / such)))
                  :ARG1 (l / little
                        :degree-of (m2 / move-01
                              :ARG0 (w / we)
                              :ARG2 (f / forward))))))
